name: WilliamsburgMarketWatch
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Are you a Greater Williamsburg Resident who is not inclined to look online to find out what is new in the real estate market in our area? Or, maybe you are a potential Buyer who is tired of having to register on real estate sites just to find out if there are any new properties that may be interesting? Or, maybe you are an Buyer's Agent who does not have access to our local MLS and would love a quick update on new listings in our specific area? Whatever your story is, you can now listen to daily updates from your go-to real estate resource in the Greater Williamsburg Virginia area. After you add the Williamsburg Market Watch skill to your device, you can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" and in under 5 minutes you will have the most up-to-date report on New Listings in the Greater Williamsburg Area. And, of course, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime. You are in control AND you don't have to sign up on any agent site and receive a plethora of emails that you have to sort through. That said, though, when you are ready to start your serious search to live in my favorite part of the Commonwealth of Virginia, don't hesitate to reach out to me directly. There are many ways to contact me, Charlene Yackanich, Realtor with Abbitt Realty Williamsburg. PutYourBestHouseForward@gmail.com, CharleneY@Abbitt.com, PutYourBestHouseForward.com, Williamsburg411.AbbittRealty.com, Call or Text: 757-372-4515, or FB/IG/Twitter @Williamsburg411.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
